label: Risk score
year: Index of various indicators: see underlying indicators for source year.
description: This risk score is a 1-10 score which combines all underlying indicators into one index, comparable accross communities. It is made up of three main pillars: vulnerability, hazards exposure and lack of coping capacity. The method and conceptual framework are derived from the INFORM model (www.inform-index.org), which applies it on a national level instead of a sub-national / community level.
description_espanol: Este puntaje de riesgo es un puntaje de 1-10 que combina todos los indicadores subyacentes en un índice, comparable entre comunidades. Está compuesto por tres pilares principales: vulnerabilidad, exposición a los peligros y falta de capacidad de afrontamiento o respuesta. El método y el marco conceptual se derivan del modelo INFORM (www.inform- index.org), que lo aplica a nivel nacional en lugar de a nivel subnacional / comunitario.

label: Hazards exposure
year: Index of various indicators: see underlying indicators for source year.
description: The hazards exposure pillar contains information on the relative risk of various types of hazards happening. You can inspect which indicators are included at present, by expanding the Hazards-section in the sidebar on the left.
description_espanol: El sustento de la exposición a los peligros contiene información sobre el riesgo relativo de varios tipos de amanezas. Usted puede inspeccionar la sección de Peligros en la barra lateral de la izquierda.

label: Vulnerability
year: Index of various indicators: see underlying indicators for source year.
description: The vulnerability pillar contains information on vulnerability: relative socio-economic status, but also inequality and presence of specific vulnerable groups. You can inspect which indicators are included at present, by expanding the Vulnerability-section in the sidebar on the left.
description_espanol: El sustento de la vulnerabilidad contiene información sobre el estado socioeconómico relativo, pero también desigualdad y presencia de grupos vulnerables específicos. Puede inspeccionar qué indicadores están incluidos actualmente, expandiendo la sección de vulnerabilidad en la barra lateral a la izquierda.

label: Lack of Coping Capacity
year: Index of various indicators: see underlying indicators for source year.
description: The Coping Capacity component of the Risk Score contains information on institutional and infrastructural capacity to coping with disasters. You can inspect which indicators are included at present, by expanding the Coping Capacity-section in the sidebar on the left.
description_espanol: La capacidad de respuesta es un componente del puntaje del riesgo que contiene información sobre la capacidad institucional y de la infraestructura para hacer frente a los desastres. Usted puede inspeccionar que indicadores están incluidos en este momento, expandiendo la sección "Capacidad de afrontamiento" en la barra lateral de la izquierda.

label: DPI
description: The Data Preparedness Index (DPI) is a measure of how well the INFORM-framework is filled for the selected country and administrative level, and thereby it is a measure of the overall Data Preparedness of the country. The DPI is derived by multiplying scores on Completeness, Recency and Quality. (See each of these for a more detailed description.) Note that a score of 0.125 results when all subcomponents score 0.5 / 50%.
description_espanol: El Índice de preparación de datos (DPI) es una medida qué tan bien se llena el marco INFORM para el país y el nivel administrativo seleccionados, y por lo tanto es una medida de la preparación de datos general del país. El DPI se obtiene al multiplicar puntajes en integridad, actualización y calidad. (Consulte cada uno de estos para obtener una descripción más detallada.) Tenga en cuenta que se obtiene una puntuación de 0.125 cuando todos los subcomponentes obtienen una puntuación de 0.5 / 50%

label: Completeness
description: The completeness indicator counts for how many indicators of the INFORM framework at least one source is included for the selected country and administrative level. Having more than one source for one indicator does not increase the Completeness score.
description_espanol: El indicador de integridad contabiliza la cantidad de indicadores del sistema INFORM y al menos una fuente está incluida en el país seleccionado y nivel administrativo. Teniendo más de una fuente para los indicadores no incrementarán el puntaje de integridad.

label: Recency
description: The recency score measures how relevant the source stilll is, given its publishing year and its "retention period".
description_espanol: El puntaje de actualización mide cuán relevante es la fuente del archivo, dado su año de publicación y su "período de retención".

label: Quality
description: The quality score gives a measure of the quality of a source (irrespective of its recency). E.g. a census is of higher quality then a survey, etc.
description_espanol: El puntaje de calidad da una medida de la calidad de una fuente (independientemente de su antigüedad). P.ej. un censo es de mayor calidad que una encuesta, etc.

label: Road accesibility
description: Accessibility according to road travel time. The original file contains 4 categories: (1) city, (2) 0-15min from commercial/agricultural centre, (3) 15-60min, (4) more than 60min.
description_espanol: Accesibilidad de acuerdo al tiempo de viaje por carretera. El archivo original contiene 4 categorías: (1) ciudad, (2) 0-15 min hacia centros económicos/infraestructuras de acopio y facilidades agrícola, (3) 15-60 min, (4) más de 60 min.

label: Nr. of educational facilities per 10,000 people
label_espanol: Nro. de centros educativos por cada 10,000 personas
description: Number of educational institutes per 10,000 people.
description_espanol: Número de establecimientos educativos por cada 10,000 personas.

label: Nr. of educational facilities per 10,000 people
label_espanol: Número de centros educativos por cada 10K personas
description: Number of educational institutes per 10,000 people. Source: Base de datos al 2016 del ESCALE - Ministerio de Educación
description_espanol: Número de centros educativos por cada 10K personas - MINEDU

label: Nr. of educational facilities per 10,000 people
description: Number of educational institutes per 10,000 people.

label: Connected to power network
description: Nighttime satelite imagery (see link) was used to determine availability of electricity per Traditional Authority (admin-3). Three cases were distinguished per TA: Yes (1), Limited (0.5) and No (0).

label: % access to power network
label_espanol: % con acceso a la red eléctrica
description: Percentage of households with acces to public power network
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares conectados a la red eléctrica

label: % Access to electricity
description: Percentage of the population with electricity access.

label: Good governance index
description: Data from National Statistics Office, which aims to create an index of good governance per municipality (see 'Technical notes' in the source url). Max. score is 841 and min. score is 18. The latest release from this source is from 2008 unfortunately, therefore this indicator should be interpreted with caution and will be updated when possible. Nonetheless, it gives some insight in the distribution of good governance over the country.
source_organization: Philippines Statistics Authority (Formerly National Statistical Coordination Board)

label: Nr. of facilities per 10,000 people
description: Data from MASDAP on point locations of health facilities in Malawi, and divides by population to get the # of facilities for each 10,000 people.
source_organization: Department of Health: Field Health Service Information System (FHSIS)

label: Nr. of facilities per 10,000 people
description: Data from FHSIS report, which sums Barangay Health Stations, Rural Health Units, Government Hospitals and Private Hospitals, and divides by population to get the # of facilities for each 10,000 people. Data collected through OCHA pre-disaster indicators. (Direct source to be added).
source_organization: Department of Health: Field Health Service Information System (FHSIS)

label: Nr. of health facilities per 10,000 people
label_espanol: Número de centros de salud por cada 10K personas
description: Number of health clinics per 10,000 people. Source: Base de datos a diciembre 2016 - Superintendencia Nacional de Salud del Ministerio de Salud
description_espanol: Número de centros de salud por cada 10K personas - MINSA

label: Nr. of health facilities per 10,000 people
label_espanol: Nro. de centros de salud por cada 10,000 personas
description: Number of health facilities per 10,000 people.
description_espanol: Número de establecimientos de salud por cada 10,000 personas.

label: Nr. of health facilities per 10,000 people
description: Number of health clinics per 10,000 people.

label: % with improved  sanitation
description: National Statistics Office of Malawi. Percentage of households with access to improved sanitation.

label: % Access improved sanitation
description: Percentage of the population using improved sanitation facilities, including flush/pour flush (to piped sewer system, septic tank, pit latrine), ventilated improved pit (VIP) latrine, pit latrine with slab, and composting toilet.

label: % Access improved water sources
description: Percentage of population with reasonable access (within 1km) to an adequate amount of water (20 litres per person) through a household connection, public standpipe well or spring, or rain water system.

label: % with internet access
label_espanol: % de hogares con acceso a internet
description: % of households with internet access. Based on ENAHO survey.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares con acceso a conexión a internet. Basado en la encuesta ENAHO - INEI

label: % with internet access
description: Percentage of households with internet access.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares con acceso a internet.

label: % with mobile access
description: National Statistics Office of Malawi. Percentage of households with access to mobile phone. Data is relatively old, but relative differences between districts are still meaningful indicators of infrastructural coping capacity.

label: % with mobile access
label_espanol: % de hogares con aceso a telefonía movil
description: % of households with mobile access. Based on ENAHO survey.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares con acceso a telefonía movil. Basados en la encuenta de ENAHO

label: % with mobile access
description: Percentage of households with mobile phone access.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares con acceso a telefonía móvil

label: % with piped water
label_espanol: % de abastecimiento de H20 en las viviendas
description: Percentage of households with piped water into house or communal, vs. water from open/protected wells or rivers/ponds/etc.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de viviendas con agua entubada dentro del domicilio o frente a agua de pozos abiertos, protegidos, ríos, estanques, etc - INEI

label: % access to drinking water
description: Percentage of households with that are connected to the public water network.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares conectados a la red pública de agua potable

label: % with improved sanitation
description: Percentage of households with access to piped sanitation
description_espanol: Porcentaje de hogares conectados a la red de alcantarillado.

label: % with improved sanitation
description: Percentage of households with access to improved sanitation.
description_espanol: Porcentaje de viviendas con acceso a sanemiento mejorado - INEI

label: Travel time to nearest city
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the travel time in minutes to the nearest city of at least 50k inhabitants. Even though the source is from 2000, this source is still a strong indicator of the remoteness of a community, and thus the relative availability or absence of facilities needed for coping capacity.

label: Travel time to nearest city
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the travel time in minutes to the nearest city of at least 50k inhabitants. Even though the source is from 2000, this source is still a strong indicator of the remoteness of a community, and thus the relative availability or absence of facilities needed for coping capacity.

label: Travel time to nearest city
label_espanol: Tiempo de viaje a la ciudad más cercana
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the travel time in minutes to the nearest city of at least 50k inhabitants. Even though the source is from 2000, this source is still a strong indicator of the remoteness of a community, and thus the relative availability or absence of facilities needed for coping capacity.
description_espanol: Tiempo de viaje estimado a la ciudad más cercana de 50K o más personas en el año 2000 - Unión Europea

label: % with piped water
description: National Statistics Office of Malawi. Percentage of households with piped water into house or communal, vs. water from open/protected wells or rivers/ponds/etc.

label: Affected crop land
description: Hectares of affected crop land from events 2008-2017
description_espanol: #N/A

label: # of damaged houses
description: Number of affected houses from events 2008-2017
description_espanol: Número de casas afectadas por eventos desde el año 2008-2017

label: # of affected people
description: Number of affected people from event from events 2008-2017
description_espanol: Número de personas afectadas por eventos desde el año 2008-2017

label: Completely damaged (abs.)
description: Completely damaged houses per municipality.

label: Completely damaged (rel.)
description: Number of completely damaged houses, made relative to the total number of houses in the municpality.

label: Total damaged houses (abs.)
description: Total number of damaged houses (completely + partially).

label: Total damaged houses (rel.)
description: Number of damaged houses, made relative to the total number of houses in the municpality.

label: # of hit distritos
description: Number of affected distritos from events 2008-2017. When 'Total' is selected as event, this means the total number of events times the average number of distritos that is hit per event. If a distrito is hit in multiple events, it counts multiple times in this total number.
description_espanol: Número de distritos afectados por los eventos del año 2008-2017. Cuando se selecciona "Total" como evento, esto significa el número total de eventos multiplicado por el número promedio de distritos que han sido impactados por evento. Si un distrito es impactado en múltiples eventos, cuenta varias veces en este número total.

label: # of hit parroquias
description: Number of affected parroquias from events 2008-2017. When 'Total' is selected as event, this means the total number of events times the average number of parroquias that is hit per event. If a parroquia is hit in multiple events, it counts multiple times in this total number.
description_espanol: #N/A

label: Partly damaged (abs.)
description: Partly damaged houses per municipality.

label: Partly damaged (rel.)
description: Number of partially damaged houses, made relative to the total number of houses in the municpality.

label: Weighed damage (abs.)
description: The prediction made in this model is a weighted sum of completely damaged houses (weight 1.00) and partly damaged houses (weight 0.25). This variable applies the same weights to the actual damage data, to be able to make a comparison.

label: Weighed damage (rel.)
description: Number of damaged houses, made relative to the total number of houses in the municpality.

label: Distance first impact
description: Distance to the first point of landfall of the typhoon in kilometers.

label: Distance to typhoon
description: Closest distance to the typhoon path in kilometers.

label: Mercalli intensity
description: Mercalli Intensity is a measure of seismic intensity of the earthquake. Source: USGS Shakemap.

label: Rainfall
description: Accumulated rainfall in millimeters per municipality during the course of the typhoon.

label: Wind speed
description: Maximum wind speed reached per municipality.

label: Predicted damage class (1-5)
description: Predicted damage class (1-5: where 5 is highest damage). See link for full methodology.

label: Actual damage class (1-5)
description: Actual damage class (1-5: where 5 is highest damage). See link for full methodology. Note that here only those municipalities for which a prediction was given off are taken in to account, for fair comparison. For full impact data, visit the IMPACT DATABASE view.

label: Prediction error
description: Prediction error: Predicted damage class (1-5) minus Actual damage class (1-5).

label: Population density
description: Most recent population data (see population info), divided by land area (computed from boundary data) in square kilometers.
description_espanol: Datos de población más recientes (ver información de población), divididos por el total de área (calculada a partir de datos de límites) en kilómetros cuadrados.

label: Population
description: Census data from 2008 per TA, scaled to match district-level population of 2014 from http://www.geohive.com/cntry/malawi.aspx.

label: Population
description: Population data from the most recent census in the Philippines (2015), collected on barangay-level.

label: Population
description: Population from 2012 Sri Lanka Census of population and housing.

label: Population
description: Population estimates from WORLDPOP, with national totals adjusted to match UN population division estimates (http://esa.un.org/wpp/)

label: Population
description: Population estimates from WORLDPOP, with national totals adjusted to match UN population division estimates (http://esa.un.org/wpp/)

label: Population
description_espanol: Población proyectada para el año 2016 - INEI

label: Population
description: Population included in admin-boundary from 2014.  See link for more info.

label: Population
description: 2015 projections of population per subcountry, calculated from Worldpop data.

label: Population
description: Alpha version 2010 estimates of numbers of people per grid square, with national totals adjusted to match UN 2015 population division estimates (http://esa.un.org/wpp/).

label: Population
description: Alpha version 2015 estimates of population, with national totals adjusted to match UN population division estimates (http://esa.un.org/wpp/) and remaining unadjusted.

label: Population
description: Estimated Population, calculated by World Bank and INEC, based on ECV 2014 and CPV 2010.
description_espanol: Población estimada, calculada por Banco Mundial e INEC, basado en la ECV 2014 y CPV 2010.

label: Population
description: Estimated Population for 2015
description_espanol: Población estimada, calculada por Banco Mundial e INEC, basado en la ECV 2014 y CPV 2010.

label: Population
description: Haitian Institute of Statistics and Information ( IHSI). Estimation methodology here: http://www.ihsi.ht/produit_demo_soc.htm Pcoded version used Administrative boundaries CODs to add pcodes.

label: Elevation
description: Mean elevation in meters per municipality.

label: Ruggedness
description: Mean ruggedness in the municipality. Ruggedness is the variability of slope. So an evenly climbing mountain has low ruggedness, but a very unevenly climbing mountain has high ruggedness.

label: Slope
description: Mean slope in the municipality. Slope is the change of elevation, so it is higher in mountaineous areas.

label: Exposure to cold waves
description: Annual average number of affected people by cold waves between 2003-2017 divided by population to get the amount for each 10,000 people
description_espanol: Promedio anual del número de personas afectadas por la presencia de heladas en los años 2003-2017 por cada 10K personas - INDECI

label: Cyclone exposure
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the expected number of people exposed to cyclones annually. The sum is taken of two sources: impact by wind and impact by storm surge. Divided by the population data, to get the relative exposure instead of the absolute number of people affected.

label: Drought exposure
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the expected number of people exposed to drought annually. Divided by the population data, to get the relative exposure instead of the absolute number of people affected.
description_espanol: Conjunto de datos grillados que estima el número esperado de personas expuestas a las sequía anualmente. Dividido por los datos de población, para obtener la exposición relativa en lugar de la cantidad absoluta de personas afectadas - UNISDR

label: Drought risk (0-10)
description: The drought risk map was created by analyzing rainfall data in the past 20 years using standard precipitation index (SPI) , which is a widely used index in drought analysis. Based on SPI6 values for the period October-march, which is the main rainy season in Malawi. Each pixel is classified to drought or no drought for each year based on SPI6 values, drought year if SPI value for a pixel is less than -1. Next, relative frequency is calculated, the number of times drought has occurred in the considered 20 year period. This frequency is then converted to probability of drought occurrence in a given year. We validated our analysis by comparing NDVI values for the drought year against long term average values.

label: Earthquake exposure
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the expected number of people exposed to earthquakes annually. In this case a magnitude of 7 is taken for earthquakes to be included. Divided by the population data, to get the relative exposure instead of the absolute number of people affected.
description_espanol: Conjunto de datos grillados que estima el número esperado de personas expuestas a un terremoto anualmente. En este caso, se toma una magnitud de 7° para que se incluyan los terremotos. Dividido por los datos de población, para obtener la exposición relativa en lugar de la cantidad absoluta de personas afectadas - UNISDR

label: Flood exposure
description: Annual % of population exposed to flood. Calculated by summing all people affected by floods over all flood events in the years 2007-2018, and dividing by the number of years (12) to get the annual amount. Divided by population per parroquia to get the percentage.
description_espanol: % Anual de la población expuesta a inundaciones. Calculado sumando todas las personas afectadas por inundaciones en todos los eventos registrados de inundaciones en los años 2007-2018, y dividiendolo para el número de años (12) para obtener la cantidad anual. Dividido para la población por cada parroquia para obtener el porcentaje.

label: Flood exposure
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the expected number of people exposed to floods annually. Divided by the population data, to get the relative exposure instead of the absolute number of people affected.
description_espanol: Conjunto de datos grillados que estima el número esperado de personas expuestas a las inundaciones anualmente. Dividido por los datos de población, para obtener la exposición relativa en lugar de la cantidad absoluta de personas afectadas - UNISDR

label: Flood risk (0-10)
description: Measure of flood risk. See link for more information on methodology.

label: Violent incidents last year
description: ACLED data on conflict & violent incidents.

label: Violent incidents last year
description: ACLED data on conflict & violent incidents.

label: Exposure to frost
description: Annual average number of affected people by snow fall between 2003-2017 divided by population to get the amount for each 10,000 people
description_espanol: Promedio anual del número de personas afectadas por la caída de nieve en los años 2003-2017 por cada 10K personas - INDECI

label: Tsunami exposure
description: Global grid dataset which estimates the expected number of people exposed to a tsunami annually. Divided by the population data, to get the relative exposure instead of the absolute number of people affected.
description_espanol: Conjunto de datos grillados que estima el número esperado de personas expuestas ante un tsunami anualmente. Dividido por los datos de población, para obtener la exposición relativa en lugar de la cantidad absoluta de personas afectadas - UNISDR

label: Volcanic exposure
description: Annual % of population exposed to volcanic activity. Calculated by summing all people affected by volcanic activities over all events in the years 2010-2018, and dividing by the number of years (9) to get the annual amount. Divided by population per parroquia to get the percentage.
description_espanol: % Anual de la población expuesta a eventos de actividad volcánica. Calculado sumando todas las personas afectadas por eventos de actividad volcánica en todos los eventos registrados de inundaciones en los años 2010-2018, y dividiendolo para el número de años (9) para obtener la cantidad anual. Dividido para la población por cada parroquia para obtener el porcentaje.

label: # of damaged houses
description: Number of affected houses from events 2008-2017
description_espanol: Número de casas afectadas por eventos desde el año 2008-2017

label: # of affected people
description: Number of affected people from event from events 2008-2017
description_espanol: Número de personas afectadas por eventos desde el año 2008-2017

label: Total # of houses
description: Total # of houses in the municipality, which is used to make the relative versions of the damage variables. The number of houses is calculated by using the 2015-census population data and dividing by 4 to account for household size. This is deemed a better proxy than the number of households which was available from the 2010 census.

label: Land area
description: Area computed on the basis of the barangay-level administrative division.
description_espanol: Área calculada sobre la base de la división administrativa de nivel distrital.

label: No. of alpacas
description: Number of alpacas per area.
description_espanol: Número de alpacas por área - CENEPRED, fuente original: MINAGRI

label: Identified for ECHO2
description: An application of this dashboard is to do INFORM-risk-based prioritization for the ECHO2-project in Malawi. Three TA's within three districts are pre-identified for area-selection. You can see here which areas those are.

label: Average elevation
description: Average elevation
description_espanol: Altitud o elevación promedio - JAXA (Agencia Aeroespacial de Japón)

label: Average elevation
description: Average elevation
description_espanol: Altitud promedio

label: % land use agriculture
description: Percentage of land used for agriculture
description_espanol: Porcentaje de uso de suelo agrícola

label: Active NGOs per 100,000 people
description: Based on 3W Operational Presence per district from OCHA (Jan 2016). The # of active Leading Organisations per district is used, as it is deemed the best and most structural proxy of NGO presence/capacity per district.

label: Nr. of RC volunteers
description: Number of Red Cross volunteers per 100,000 people (see population for source of population data)
description_espanol: Número de voluntarios registrados de la Cruz Roja Ecuatoriana

label: Nr. of RC volunteers per 10,000 people
label_espanol: Nro. de voluntarios de CRE por cada 10,000 personas
description: Number of Red Cross volunteers
description_espanol: Número de voluntarios registrados de la Cruz Roja Ecuatoriana por cada 100,000 personas

label: RC volunteers per 100,000 people
description: Per Red Cross branche the # of volunteers was requested (this measure is probably not perfect, but as good as possible). Where needed, this was aggregated to districts (some districts have 2 branches, most have 1). The # of volunteers is divided by the district population to get to this capacity.

label: Total length of main rivers
description: Total river length in kilometres
description_espanol: Longitud total de ríos en kilómetros

label: Prediction error
description: The predicted weighted sum of damage (rel.) minus the actual weighted sum of damage (rel.). These are two percentages that are subtracted from each other, so the result is a percentage-point difference. Note that the average which is shown on the sidebar is not a Mean Absolute Prediction Error (MAPE) or other measure of accuracy at the moment. It is simply a numeric average of prediction errors where positives and negatives cancel each other out. Adequate measures of accuracy will be added to this dashboard soon.

label: Prediction error
description: The predicted weighted sum of damage (rel.) minus the actual weighted sum of damage (rel.). These are two percentages that are subtracted from each other, so the result is a percentage-point difference. Note that the average which is shown on the sidebar is not a Mean Absolute Prediction Error (MAPE) or other measure of accuracy at the moment. It is simply a numeric average of prediction errors where positives and negatives cancel each other out. Adequate measures of accuracy will be added to this dashboard soon.

label: Predicted % completely damaged houses
description: The prediction made in this model is a weighted sum of completely damaged houses (weight 1.00) and partly damaged houses (weight 0.25). This is subsequently related to the number of households in the municipality to get an overview of the relative damage.

label: Predicted # of houses damaged
description: Prediction of number of households damaged (partially + completely together).

label: Predicted % of houses damaged
description: Prediction of percentage of households damaged (partially + completely together).

label: Predicted weighed damage (abs.)
description: The prediction made in this model is a weighted sum of completely damaged houses (weight 1.00) and partly damaged houses (weight 0.25). This is to reflect that partly damaged houses play a smaller role in the overall damage assessment of a municipality, and thus in the degree to which it should be a priority area.

label: Predicted weighed damage (rel.)
description: The prediction made in this model is a weighted sum of completely damaged houses (weight 1.00) and partly damaged houses (weight 0.25). This is subsequently related to the number of households in the municipality to get an overview of the relative damage.

label: Poverty incidence
description: Alpha version 2008 estimates of proportion of people per grid square living in poverty, as defined by the Multidimensional Poverty Index (http://www.ophi.org.uk/policy/multidimensional-poverty-index/). Tatem AJ, Gething PW, Bhatt S, Weiss D and Pezzulo C (2013) Pilot high resolution poverty maps, University of Southampton/Oxford. Averaged to subcounties.

label: Poverty incidence
description: Alpha version 2011 estimates of proportion of people per grid square living in poverty, as defined by $2 a day thresholds. Tatem AJ, Gething PW, Bhatt S, Weiss D and Pezzulo C (2013) Pilot high resolution poverty maps, University of Southampton/Oxford.

label: Recent shocks
description: This is a measure of recent shocks, in this case by how many tropical cyclones and earthquakes caused damage per municipality in recent years (see link for included cyclonen/earthquakes). It is measured on municipal level, so on provincial level the number should be interpreted as the average hit rate per municipality within that province.

label: Priority area Water
description: Woreda's are given a priority from 1 (high) to 3 (low) with respect to Water cluster. These numbers are aggregated to zones and regions, which leads to decimal averages.

label: Priority area Health/Nutrition
description: Woreda's are given a priority from 1 (high) to 3 (low) with respect to Health/Nutrition cluster. These numbers are aggregated to zones and regions, which leads to decimal averages.

label: Flood risk
description: Woreda's are defined at flood risk (1) or not (0). These numbers are aggregated to zones and regions, which leads to decimal averages.

label: Population
description: 2018 Population estimation done by UNFPA with Institut de Statistiques et d'Etudes Economiques du Burundi.

label: Administrative areas - level 2
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: Administrative areas - level 1
description: Administrative boundary data. See link for more information.

label: Flood exposure (abs)
description: The indicator is based on the estimated number of people exposed to floods per year. It results from the combination of the hazard zones. It thus indicates the absolute expected number of people exposed in the hazard zone in one year. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Food Insecurity
description: The indicator is based on the Cadre Harmonisé from 2012 to 2016. For each year, the highest phase values has been used for each admin1 unit. The yearly IPC level values are normalized between 0-10 and then the indicator is the mean of the 5 years scores. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018.

label: Land Degradation
description: Land degradation has been defined by LADA as the reduction in the capacity of the land to provide ecosystem goods and services over a period of time for its beneficiaries. Ecosystem goods refer to absolute quantities of land produce having an economic or social value for human beings. The land degradation classes map describes the overall status in provision of biophysical ecosystem services and the processes of declining biophysical ecosystem services. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Flood exposure (rel)
description: The indicator is based on the estimated number of people exposed to floods per year. It results from the combination of the hazard zones and the total population living in the spatial unit. It thus indicates the percentage of expected average annual population potentially at risk. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Agriculture Droughts Probability
description: The indicator is based on the FAO Agriculture Stress Index (ASI) that highlights anomalous vegetation growth and potential drought in arable land. It is defined as the annual probability to have more than 30% of agriculture area affected by drought. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Conflict fatalities
description: Nr. of fatalities during armed conflicts between aug-2017 and july-2018. Source: ACLED (Armed Conflict Location & Event Data Project) Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Poverty Index
description: The Multidimensional Poverty MPI Index identifies overlapping deprivations at the household level across the same three dimensions as the Human Development Index (living standards, health, and education) and shows the average number of poor people and deprivations with which poor households contend. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Income inequality
description: Gini index measures the extent to which the distribution of income or consumption expenditure among individuals or households within an economy deviates from a perfectly equal distribution. Thus a Gini index of 0 represents perfect equality, while an index of 100 implies perfect inequality. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Uprooted people (rel)
description: Persons of concern includes refugees, asylum-seekers, returnees, stateless persons and groups of internally displaced persons (IDPs). Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: HIV Prevalence
description: The estimated number of adults aged 15-49 years with HIV infection, whether or not they have developed symptoms of AIDS, expressed as per cent of total population in that age group. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Measles Prevalence
description: Metadata to be included. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Mortality rate U5
description: This indicator shows the probability of death between birth and the end of the fifth year per 1000 live births. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Underweight U5
description: This indicator shows the ratio between weight and age of children under five. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Acute Malnutrition U5
description: Metadata to be included. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Underweight Women
description: Metadata to be included. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Food Insecurity Percentage
description: Metadata to be included. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Adult Literacy
description: Metadata to be included. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Access to Electricity
description: Metadata to be included. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Access to Sanitation
description: Access to improved sanitation facilities refers to the percentage of the population using improved sanitation facilities. The improved sanitation facilities include flush/pour flush (to piped sewer system, septic tank, pit latrine), ventilated improved pit (VIP) latrine, pit latrine with slab, and composting toilet. Source: World Bank. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Access to Improved Water Source
description: The indicator defines the percentage of population with reasonable access (within one km) to an adequate amount of water (20 litres per person) through a household connection, public standpipe well or spring, or rain water system. An improved drinking-water source is defined as one that, by nature of its construction or through active intervention, is protected from outside contamination, in particular from contamination with faecal matter. Source: WHO Global Health Observatory Data Repository. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Immunization DTC
description: Immunization rate (or 1-year-olds immunized against): DTC (Average of DTC1 and DTC3). Source: WHO. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel

label: Immunization Measles
description: The percentage of children under one year of age who have received at least one dose of measles-containing vaccine in a given year. The physical infrastructure component tries to assess the accessibility as well as the redundancy of the systems which are two crucial characteristics in a crisis situation. Measles immunization coverage is a good proxy of health system performance. Accessed through INFORM Sahel model 2018: http://www.inform-index.org/Subnational/Sahel
